Welcome to graphai-wikitext’s documentation!¶

class wikitext.Wikitext(raw_text, anchor_page_ids=None)¶

A Wikitext is initialised with a text and computes its related Wikipedia concepts.

raw_text¶

A string with the text the Wikitext represents.

Type

str

anchor_page_ids¶

A list containing the ids of the anchor pages to define the search space.

Type

list[int]

results¶

A list of the results after wikifying the text.

Type

list[dict]

keywords()¶
Returns

A list of the unique keywords present in the results.

Return type

list[str]

keywords_aggregated()¶

Aggregates results with the same keywords averaging their scores.

Returns

A list of the aggregated results, unique by keywords. Their scores are averaged.

Return type

list[dict]

keywords_results(keywords)¶
Returns

A list of the results matching the provided keywords.

Return type

list[dict]

page_aggregated()¶

Aggregates results with the same page id averaging their scores.

Returns

A list of the aggregated results, unique by page id. Their scores are averaged.

Return type

list[dict]

page_ids()¶
Returns

A list of the unique page ids present in the results.

Return type

list[int]

page_results(page_id)¶
Returns

A list of the results matching the provided page id.

Return type

list[dict]

page_titles()¶
Returns

A list of the unique page titles present in the results.

Return type

list[str]

pair_results(keywords, page_id)¶
Returns

A list of the results matching the provided pair (keywords, page id).

Return type

list[dict]

unique_pairs()¶
Returns

A list of the unique pairs (keywords, page id) present in the results.

Return type

list[tuple(str, int)]

wikitext.combine(wikitexts, f=None)¶

Returns all results for all wikitexts with the scores aggregated according to f.

Parameters

  • wikitexts (list[Wikitext]) – A list of Wikitext objects.

  • f (Callable[list[Number], Number]) – A function to aggregate the scores of the common pages. Default: None (numpy.mean)

Returns

A list of the common results aggregated according to f.

Return type

list[dict]
